title: Elementalist Lux Form change Bug [IN-GAME]

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
In-game bug with Elementalist Lux, You can transform in the same element twice. I only Managed to do this with Fire + Fire = Nature And Air + Air = Water.


When you first transform you select a form then you get your second transformation and you can see how the previous element isnt blurred out so click it again and watch the Magic.

replies.body:
Hey NOGShadowSpire -

Thanks for the report! There's a fix on PBE for this that'll go out with the next patch. ^-^
